original: Āsavasampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: āsava sampayuttam hetum dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam hetum dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Āsavasampayuttaṁ hetuñca āsavavippayuttaṁ hetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto
analyzed: āsava sampayuttam hetuñca āsava vippayuttam hetuñca dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ

original: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi saṅkhitta hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi
pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava

original: Āsavasampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: āsava sampayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cattāri …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam na hetum dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā cattāri pe vipāke ekam pe avigate cattāri
